doc.title: Motel
doc.plot: Set in a strange, dark Motel located at the point between reality, death and dreams (just outside Chichester). The show focused on the staff and residents, including the shadowy owner Mr Patchouli, gay robot barmen Sam and Woody, erotic dancer Dee and the Motel's only customer, Bill Beluga, a seller of turkey collars and cock-shaped candy.
